Jack Aubrey.action: Commands to set studdingsails and top gallants, wet the sails, and place idlers along the rail.

Jack Aubrey.action: Rides the ship like a charioteer, one eye aloft on the creaking topmost spar, maintaining control under great press of sail.

Jack Aubrey.action: Touches wood despite confident handling of the ship.

Jack Aubrey.action: Stares ahead to the darkening sky and massive rolling waves with a wild, unruly part of him loving the challenge.

Jack Aubrey.action: Maintains focus and calm on the quarterdeck while officers look to him for guidance.
